title.rendered: ILM Steel Knuckle Motorcycle ATV Motocross Dirt Bike Racing

content.rendered:
• Professional alloy steel protection parts, made by injection molding, 100% full protection, comfortable and fashionable.
  • Engineered according to the human body. With maximum protection for the joints, the finger joints are made with anti-collision protection.
  • The outer part of the hand is design using a large area of U type protection, the arch-shape is in accordance with the back of the hand.
  • The palm was design using a 3D classic plastic non-slip lines to strengthen the anti-slip function.
  • This glove gives the palm the maximum degree of anti-slip function and a full range of grasping conditions.
